= Introduction =
WildCardPath is a piece of text that try to describe an estructure of folder + file + locale (language & country) used by the plugin to discover asociated files.
This piece of text is like a simple regular expresion (simplified) that show to the plugin, how to search files into project.

= Details =
The wildcard path have fixed tokens that can be used in distincts form to build the path to some file.
The common structure is:
/{root}/{filename}.{lang}.{country}.{fileextension}
* Folder bars are '/'
* {filename} Is the wildcard that represents the filename
* {fileextension} Again is the representation of fileextension
* {lang} Represents 2 letters lower case code of language [ISO Codes |http://www.iso.org/iso/iso_catalogue/catalogue_tc/catalogue_detail.htm?csnumber=43380]
* {country}
(Under update)
[http://localizedproperties.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/wildcardpathEditor.png]

El uso de éste objeto busca resolver el problema de que para distintos lenguajes de programacion los archivos de properties tienen su internacionalización bajo distintos patrones.

== [http://java.sun.com/developer/technicalArticles/Intl/ResourceBundles/ Java] ==
  * El property por default se encuentra en `com.mipaquete.MiProperty.properties`
  * El property para es AR se encuentra en `com.mipaquete.MiProperty.es_AR.properties`
  * La i18n de en US se encuentra en `com.mipaquete.MiProperty.en_US.properties`
